name: Vanildo's Journey
description:
Vanildo's Journey is a playful adventure game, focused on humorous characters, comic events and exploration elements with touches of suspense and mystery. The game tells a story full of twists, unique and charismatic characters, secrets hidden by the map and a simple and intuitive turn-based combat.

In addition to offering a casual and pleasant environment, RPG brings a rewarding game style for curious players who seek to explore everything and "replay" more than once, seeking to make different choices and paths, and may even find different endings in the same scene. Players must enter with a clean and open mind, looking for a dynamic and pleasant game, thus, they will achieve a satisfying experience that mixes gallows humor with a tense and dismal environment.
